attributes.action: Review Immigration costs to the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Review the processes to reduce the cost's to the taxpayer. 
Legal Aid should not be available for non British residents.

Illigal immigants traveling through from safe countries, deported directly back to that safe country. 

Failed Asylum seekers should be deported, however permitted to appeal at their own cost from their own country.
